vb10:1.2.pli: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

vb10:2.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā—

vb10:3.1.pli: So tathā sato viharanto taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmaṃsamāpajjati—

vb10:4.1.pli: Tassa taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinato pavicarato parivīmaṃsamāpajjato āraddhaṃ hoti vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ—

vb10:8.1.pli: So tathā samāhitaṃ cittaṃ sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hoti—

vb10:9.2.pli: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

vb10:10.2.pli: Atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu sati, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu sati.

vb10:10.3.pli: Yadapi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:10.4.pli: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:11.2.pli: Atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu pavicayo, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo.

vb10:11.3.pli: Yadapi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:11.4.pli: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:12.2.pli: Atthi kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ, atthi cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ.

vb10:12.3.pli: Yadapi kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:12.4.pli: Yadapi cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:13.2.pli: Atthi savitakkasavicārā pīti, atthi avitakkaavicārā pīti.

vb10:13.3.pli: Yadapi savitakkasavicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:13.4.pli: Yadapi avitakkaavicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:14.3.pli: Yadapi kāyapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:14.4.pli: Yadapi cittapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:15.2.pli: Atthi savitakko savicāro samādhi, atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi.

vb10:15.3.pli: Yadapi savitakko savicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:15.4.pli: Yadapi avitakko avicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:16.2.pli: Atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu upekkhā, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā.

vb10:16.3.pli: Yadapi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:16.4.pli: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.

vb10:17.2.pli: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

vb10:18.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ,

vb10:18.8.pli: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.

vb10:20.2.pli: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

vb10:21.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti—

vb10:22.2.pli: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—

vb10:23.2.pli: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—

vb10:24.2.pli: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—

vb10:25.2.pli: Yā pīti pāmojjaṃ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṃ attamanatā cittassa pītisambojjhaṅgo—

vb10:26.2.pli: Yā vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa viññāṇakkhandhassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhi passambhanā paṭippassambhanā paṭippassambhitattaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgo—

vb10:27.2.pli: Yā cittassa ṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—

vb10:28.2.pli: Yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—

vb10:30.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—

vb10:31.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—

vb10:33.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti—

vb10:33.4.pli: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, tasmiṃ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti—

vb10:34.2.pli: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—

vb10:35.2.pli: Yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—

vb10:37.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb10:37.4.pli: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannaṃ—

vb10:38.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti.

vb10:38.4.pli: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ suññataṃ, yā tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—

vb10:40.2.pli: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

vb10:41.1.pli: Sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?

vb10:43.2.pli: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.

vb10:47.1.pli: Siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.

vb10:48.1.pli: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, sukhasahagato, na upekkhāsahagato;

vb10:48.2.pli: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.

vb10:57.1.pli: Na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino;

vb10:58.1.pli: Siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino.

vb10:59.1.pli: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.

vb10:61.1.pli: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.

vb10:64.2.pli: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva sahetuko ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva sahetukā cā”ti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū.

vb10:64.3.pli: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cā”ti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū.

vb10:64.4.pli: Cha bojjhaṅgā na hetū sahetukā, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo na vattabbo “na hetusahetuko”tipi, “na hetuahetuko”tipi.

vb10:66.4.pli: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”tipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi.

vb10:66.5.pli: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.

vb10:70.1.pli: Pītisambojjhaṅgo appītiko, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā.

vb10:70.2.pli: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā.

vb10:70.3.pli: Pītisambojjhaṅgo sukhasahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā.

vb10:70.4.pli: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na upekkhāsahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā.
